missing_features.description: Complete HIPAA compliance system with BAA, PHI handling, and medical spa specific features
missing_features.why_important: Legal requirement for medical spas, competitive differentiator

missing_features.description: Support for independent contractor model with separate payment accounts and rent collection
missing_features.why_important: Expands addressable market to hybrid business models

missing_features.description: Built-in marketing automation with flows, campaigns, and client segmentation
missing_features.why_important: Client retention and revenue growth driver

missing_features.description: Assisted migration from competing platforms with dedicated support
missing_features.why_important: Reduces switching friction and customer acquisition cost

missing_features.description: Demo environment with sample data for testing and training
missing_features.why_important: Improves user onboarding and reduces trial conversion barriers

missing_features.description: Streamlined booking via SMS links with payment collection and error reduction
missing_features.why_important: Reduces booking errors, automates payment collection, improves efficiency

missing_features.description: Complete system for managing wedding parties, events, and group appointments
missing_features.why_important: Essential for medical spas handling events and group services

missing_features.description: Digital waiting room with contactless check-in and client flow management
missing_features.why_important: Post-COVID necessity, improves client experience and operations

missing_features.description: Automated waitlist matching with available openings and rebooking assistance
missing_features.why_important: Maximizes appointment utilization and revenue recovery

missing_features.description: Room, equipment, and capacity management with conflict prevention
missing_features.why_important: Prevents double-booking of limited resources, optimizes utilization

missing_features.description: Complex service timing with staff optimization during processing phases
missing_features.why_important: Maximizes staff efficiency during multi-phase treatments

missing_features.description: Automated SMS-based check-in and mobile payment checkout
missing_features.why_important: Reduces front desk workload, enables contactless operations

missing_features.description: Automated recurring appointment scheduling with flexible patterns
missing_features.why_important: Reduces administrative work for regular clients

missing_features.description: Manual discount application with percentage and fixed amount options
Complete return processing for both credit card and non-credit card purchases
missing_features.why_important: Customer service requirement and inventory accuracy

missing_features.description: Bluetooth/USB barcode scanner support for product checkout
missing_features.why_important: Speeds up product sales and reduces errors

missing_features.description: Complete cash handling with counts, pay-ins, pay-outs, and reconciliation
Comprehensive tip handling including cash payouts and assignment correction

priority_recommendations.rationale: Core differentiator that reduces booking errors, automates payments, and improves operational efficiency
Essential post-COVID feature that improves client experience and operational flow
Legal requirement for medical spas and major competitive differentiator
Critical for events, weddings, and group services - high revenue impact
Maximizes appointment utilization and revenue recovery from cancellations
Prevents resource conflicts and optimizes room/equipment utilization
Major revenue driver through client retention and automated campaigns
Optimizes staff utilization during complex multi-phase treatments
Expands addressable market to hybrid business models
Reduces front desk workload and enables contactless operations

integration_gaps.gap: Missing automated flows, templates, and advanced messaging features
No built-in email campaigns, client segmentation, or automated flows
integration_gaps.business_impact: Lower client retention and reduced marketing effectiveness

integration_gaps.gap: Missing payment splits, tip management, and complex payment scenarios
integration_gaps.business_impact: Limited payment flexibility and staff compensation issues

workflow_gaps.competitor_capability: Full group management with shared services and split payments
workflow_gaps.business_impact: Cannot effectively serve wedding parties and group events

workflow_gaps.competitor_capability: Intelligent waitlist automatically matches clients to openings
workflow_gaps.business_impact: Lost revenue from unfilled appointment slots

workflow_gaps.competitor_capability: Full contactless check-in, waiting room, and checkout
workflow_gaps.business_impact: Higher operational costs and reduced client safety perception
